message_1:
Let X be a complex projective variety with Hodge numbers (h^{p,q}) given by 

h^{1,0} = 2, h^{2,0} = 1, h^{0,1} = h^{0,2} = h^{1,1} = 0.

Compute the dimension of the space of holomorphic 1-forms on X.
message_2: The dimension of the space of holomorphic 1-forms on X is given by the Hodge number h^{1,0}. In this case, h^{1,0} = 2, so the dimension of the space of holomorphic 1-forms on X is 2.
